document.full_text: the u.n. general assembly voted overwhelmingly tuesday to give the european union special rights to speak on behalf of the 27-member bloc at the world body, ending a dispute with other regional groups.
document.title: eu wins special rights at u.n.
lines_and_colors: the u.n. general assembly voted overwhelmingly tuesday to give the european union special rights to speak on behalf of the 27-member bloc at the world body, ending a dispute with other regional groups.
